articles.title: Scientists Are Killing Off Virtual Stars to Study Black Holes - Futurism
articles.description: It's almost sadistic.
articles.content:
Killing Room
To unravel the mysteries of black holes, a team of Australian astrophysicists is simulating virtual stars and then repeatedly killing them off.
